biolockj.module.implicit.qiime

Class MergeOtuTables

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.implicit.qiime.MergeQiimeOtuTables
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule

    public class MergeOtuTables
extends ScriptModuleImpl
implements ScriptModule
    This BioModule will run immediately after QiimeClosedRefClassifier if multiple otu_table.biom files were created.

        public List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
                               throws Exception
        Build a single bash script line to call "merge_otu_tables.py" to create the single "otu_table.biom", as required by QiimeParser.
        Specified by:

        Nested list of bash scripts lines

      • executeTask

        public void executeTask()
                 throws Exception
